title: Create meta-skill for creating Claude Code skills
description:
Create a Claude Code skill in ~/.claude/skills/ that guides the process of creating new skills. This meta-skill should include:
- Skill anatomy and structure requirements
- YAML frontmatter format and required fields
- Best practices for skill naming and organization
- Templates for different types of skills
- Guidelines for when to use skills vs skills.private
- Testing and validation checklist

This will be a non-private skill since the guidance applies universally.

title: Implement skills vs skills.private structure in dotfiles
description:
Set up the directory structure and configuration for managing Claude Code skills:
- Create .claude/skills/ in dotfiles repo
- Add /.claude/skills.private to dotfiles .gitignore
- Create symlink: ~/.claude/skills -> ~/Code/dotfiles/.claude/skills
- Create ~/.claude/skills.private/ directory
- Update dotfiles README.md with skills documentation
- Create .claude/skills/README.md with guidelines

This establishes the pattern for portable vs company-specific skills.

title: Refactor TNM data refresh skill to skills.private
description:
Move the TNM data refresh skill from project-level to company-level personal skills:
- Move ~/Code/3fes/.claude/skills/refreshing-tnm-data-from-production/ to ~/.claude/skills.private/
- Update skill prerequisites to remove branch requirement (or adjust as needed)
- Add 3fes/.claude to .gitignore to exclude personal Claude config
- Test that skill is still discoverable by Claude Code
- Update any documentation references

This makes the skill available across all Wonder/BlueApron projects while keeping it out of version control.
